name: dns2
body:
### Decentralised, 0 downtime, free domain name system
dns2 exists in the form of a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain. This means that it is trustless, can't be censored and has no downtime. See the [Github directory](https://github.com/sinking-point/dns2/) for the source code, address and JSON interface.

### Work that needs doing
The contract needs testing. Also, there aren't any browsers that support dns2 at the moment. Perhaps this could be solved with plugins?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
